page.title: 03HOME LIFE
page.content: My parents each have a job. My father is a blacksmith and he is quite often late home because he has to travel a lot. My mother works with computers. She has to do the housework and she works in the garden. I help by watering the plants and other jobs. My mum works nights so we see her more because she sleeps while we are at school.They go to the club or sometimes the Trevor Arms for a meal with friends. ************* At home my mum cooks the dinner on our Raburn.It is a cooker with a fire inside. My mum is a cook and my dad is a lorry driver. My brother and I sometimes go to work with my dad. During the summer holidays I stay with my nan as mum is at work. In the holidays we go swimming and for days out to different places.
